actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia, the Pacific, Central Asia and Nonproliferation.

Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, Financial Services, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
